title: Array of Element's Siblings
description: In this lab, we will explore how to manipulate arrays and objects in JavaScript. You will learn how to add, remove, and modify elements in arrays and objects using various built-in methods and operators. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to work with arrays and objects in JavaScript and be able to apply this knowledge to write efficient and effective code.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
